title: The Revenge of the Lady on the White Horse - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Reincarnation   Revenge   Second Chance
author: Abangkaebi   아방깨비
description:
For the sin of adultery, I was sentenced to death.

“Only God will know of my sin, and even at this moment I have nothing to be ashamed of.”

As soon as I finished talking, people started calling me a witch. Amidst the chaos, I definitely saw someone’s despicable smile. And when I opened my eyes again, I had returned to the moment right before my marriage.

Who killed my husband?

Who caused the downfall of my household?

And who accused me of falling into adultery?

I have to know. Everything. Not only a fancy duchess…

But I will become an elegant villainess and definitely destroy those people.>
